nodes.text: Form-chair was the generic term used to describe any chair which molded itself to the user's body contours.

Klo Merit had a form-chair in his office at RMSU-7 during the Clone Wars. The first Death Star was equipped with form-chairs; and Xizor also had one, which featured cloned leather and a voxchip that was not able to pronounce his name.

In 44 ABY after Lost Tribe of Sith emergence crisis, Millennium Falcon was fitted with form-chair as suggestion from Lando Calrissian, after previous ones were destroyed during Assault on the New Jedi Temple by thermal detonator thrown by Sith apprentice Vestara Khai.
